name: I Have A Dream Foundation Reviews

review.title: “I enjoyed working for IHAD”
review.pros: Pros – I enjoyed the team, students and seeing the students graduate from HS, and go on to college
review.cons: Cons – IHAD ran out of funding, and had to close its doors. So many students lost the support system they had since elementary school.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Ensure stronger fundraising and fiscal management strategies.
